India news Plane flies on for around three hours after hitting a wall on take off An investigation has been ordered after a plane from India's Trichy airport hit a wall on taking off. The plane continued to fly to its scheduled desti- nation in Dubai before eventually turning back to Mumbai. There were no reported injuries from the 130 people on board.
